blogPost.excerpt: Anyone can have great ideas, but not everyone is a designer! Powered by AI, Uizard empowers anyone to easily design interactive web & mobile apps. 🛠 rapid prototyping, 🧠 brainstorming and ideation workshops, ✍️ design sprints, 👔 pitching clients, & more.
blogPost.body: Anyone can have great ideas, but not everyone is a designer! Powered by AI, Uizard empowers anyone to easily design interactive web & mobile apps. 🛠 rapid prototyping, 🧠 brainstorming and ideation workshops, ✍️ design sprints, 👔 pitching clients, & more.
blogPost.title: Uizard - The design tool for everyone, powered by AI
blogPost.author: Thomas Schranz ⛄️

localize.description: 任何人都可以有伟大的想法，但不是每个人都是设计师! 在人工智能的支持下，Uizard使任何人都能轻松设计交互式网络和移动应用。🛠快速原型设计、🧠头脑风暴和构思研讨会、✍️设计冲刺、👔推销客户等。
localize.tagline: 每个人的设计工具，由AI驱动

localize.description: 任何人都可以有偉大的想法，但不是每個人都是設計師! 在人工智能的支持下，Uizard使任何人都能輕鬆設計交互式網絡和移動應用。🛠快速原型設計、🧠頭腦風暴和構思研討會、✍️設計衝刺、👔推銷客戶等。
localize.tagline: 每個人的設計工具，由AI驅動

previous.excerpt: iLinkPro gives you the creative agency to take your links and brand to the next level. We have custom domains and branding, SEO, analytics, music/video embeds, QR codes, and MORE! You only get one first impression, so make it count!
previous.title: iLinkPro - The New Way To Link - Bio Link Tool

localize.description: iLinkPro为您提供创意机构，将您的链接和品牌提升到一个新的水平。我们拥有自定义域名和品牌、SEO、分析、音乐/视频嵌入、二维码以及更多! 您的第一印象只有一个，所以要好好利用它。
localize.tagline: 链接的新方式--生物链接工具

localize.description: iLinkPro爲您提供創意機構，將您的鏈接和品牌提升到一個新的水平。我們擁有自定義域名和品牌、SEO、分析、音樂/視頻嵌入、二維碼以及更多! 您的第一印象只有一個，所以要好好利用它。
localize.tagline: 鏈接的新方式--生物鏈接工具

next.excerpt: Prize Card™ is a debit card that lets you win money and rewards instantly every time you use it. When you pay using Prize Card™ the merchant (i.e. the store) pays us a small transaction fee which we use to fund giveaways.
next.title: Prize - Debit card with amazing rewards

localize.description: Prize Card™是一种借记卡，让您每次使用时都能立即赢得金钱和奖励。当您使用Prize Card™付款时，商家（即商店）会向我们支付少量的交易费，我们将其用于资助赠品。
Prize Card™是一種借記卡，讓您每次使用時都能立即贏得金錢和獎勵。當您使用Prize Card™付款時，商家（即商店）會向我們支付少量的交易費，我們將其用於資助贈品。
